about_the_game:
Welcome to the adrenaline-fueled world of Xero, a high-octane platform game that thrusts you into the cockpit of a futuristic fighting robot! Strap on your jetpack, power up your lasers, and unsheathe your razor-sharp swords as you prepare for the ultimate battle.

In Xero, speed is the name of the game. Engage in heart-pounding platforming action as you navigate through a myriad of treacherous environments, utilizing your robot's agility and lightning-fast reflexes to overcome every obstacle in your path. Soar through the air with your powerful jetpack, effortlessly leaping across chasms and evading enemy fire.
